課程介紹 Introduction to the course：
本學期「高級華語」是為完成中級華語課程的學生所開設。在本課程當中，學生繼續中級到高級的讀寫技能訓練，同時練習和提高他們的聽力和口語交流能力。除了中文語言技能之外，學生還能增進他們對現代華人文化和社會的理解。
This course is “Advanced Chinese.” It is designed for students who have complete “intermediate Chinese” at NTUT. It continues the training of intermediate-to-advanced level reading and writing skills while also helping students practice and improve their listening and verbal communication skills. In addition to Chinese language skills, students enhance their knowledge and understanding of modern Chinese culture and society as well.

課堂活動方式：
為求熟練語言技能與相關文化層面，每一單元課堂活動分成三個部分：
1.　　講解生詞、語法、課文。
2.　　與課文相關的文化活動。
（1）　　觀賞相關影視作品
（2）　　根據主題分組討論，表達對相關文化的看法。
3.　　練習、複習與測驗。
Classroom activities:
In order to be familiar with language skills and relevant cultural aspects, the classroom activities of each chapter are divided into three parts:
1. Explain new words, grammar points, and texts.
2. Cultural activities related to the text.
(1) Watching related film and television works.
(2) Expressing views on cultural aspects through group discussions.
3. Practice, review and tests.
